events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking status hasn't updated for days.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's message and order tracking info.
The support case was assigned to Agent Rachel for further assistance with the delayed shipment.
Hello, I’m Rachel from support. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. Let me check on that for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking details so I can investigate the shipping status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking code is TRACK98765. Looking forward to your update.
Thank you for the info. I've contacted the courier service and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. Your package is expected to arrive within three more days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you checking with the courier and letting me know about the new estimated delivery.
I’m glad I could assist. We will keep monitoring the delivery and ensure your package arrives safely.
Just checking in to confirm your package has arrived and everything is in order. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday and everything is perfect. Thank you for your help and follow up!
We are happy to hear your package has arrived safely. Closing this case now. Have a wonderful day!
Please take a moment to fill out our satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
I completed the survey and rated the support experience highly. Thanks for the attentive service.
The support case has been archived automatically after the standard retention period.
